greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of labeled connected k-uniform hypergraphs spanning n vertices.
formula: Column k is the logarithmic transform of the inverse binomial transform of c(d) = 2^binomial(d,k).
xref: Second column is A001187. Row sums are A299353.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jun 18 2018
